profileInfo.title: Senior Frontend Developer
summary: Frontend Developer with 9 years of experience with JavaScript and TypeScript, specializing in building high-performance, responsive, and scalable web applications. Proficient in Angular and React, with a strong commitment to clean code and best practices. Experienced in Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum.

Goal-oriented, organized, and always striving to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies. A strong team player focused on continuous improvement and delivering solutions that meet both user and business needs.

responsibilities: Responsibilities
moreExpInfo: For additional work experience prior to 2015, please visit:

Unit testing for Angular components and services using Jasmine and Karma testing frameworks
